[@microsoft/fast-element](./fast-element.md) &gt; [StyleTarget](./fast-element.styletarget.md)

## StyleTarget interface

A node that can be targeted by styles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StyleTarget 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [adoptedStyleSheets](./fast-element.styletarget.adoptedstylesheets.md) | CSSStyleSheet\[\] | Stylesheets to be adopted by the node. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [append(styles)](./fast-element.styletarget.append.md) | Adds styles to the target by appending the styles. |
|  [prepend(styles)](./fast-element.styletarget.prepend.md) | Adds styles to the target by prepending the styles. |
|  [querySelectorAll(selectors)](./fast-element.styletarget.queryselectorall.md) | Returns all element descendants of node that match selectors. |
|  [removeChild(styles)](./fast-element.styletarget.removechild.md) | Removes styles from the target. |
